email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah Carter,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN WAVE, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric ton. The laycan period is from October 10 to October 15, 2023. Please let us know if this works for you or if you require any adjustments.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems reasonable, but we would like to inquire about the demurrage terms and whether the laycan period can be extended to October 17, as our loading operations might require additional time.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Sarah Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE - Demurrage & Laycan
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your feedback. We can extend the laycan period to October 17. Regarding demurrage, our standard rate is USD 8,000 per day, applicable after the agreed laydays. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for accommodating the laycan extension. However, the demurrage rate seems high. Could we negotiate this to USD 7,000 per day? Additionally, we would appreciate a slight reduction in the freight rate to USD 41.50 per MT.

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
Sarah Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

We appreciate your negotiation points. After reviewing, we can adjust the demurrage rate to USD 7,000 per day and the freight rate to USD 41.75 per MT. We hope this meets your requirements.

Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment: MV OCEAN WAVE - Acceptance
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The revised terms are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and share the final documentation at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Sarah Carter
